title: Year of Date Calculation
description: This function calculates the year of a given date based on the input provided. The input date (IDATE) is converted to a DWORD format, adjusted, and then calculated to determine the corresponding year starting from 1970.
name: YEAR_OF_DATE

input.name: IDATE
input.description: The input date from which the year is to be extracted.

output.name: year
output.description: The calculated year derived from the input date.

return_value.description: The function returns the year as an integer.
